description: Installation of 2 No. External Condensers including pipework to external gable
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The total noise level from fixed plants shall be at least 10 dB(A) or more below the measured LA90 level at the nearest noise sensitive premises at any time. The method of assessment shall be carried in accordance with. BS4142: 2014:</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-weight: 700; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound<font color="#222222">.</font></span><br></p><p>Reason: In the interests of amenity of neighbouring residents and the amenity of the surrounding area.</p>

<p>Prior to commencement use the development hereby approved shall be mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors which are vibration isolated from the casing and adequately silenced.&nbsp; The development shall be retained as such in perpetuity. </p><p>Reason: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the area generally.</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
